azurerm_site_recovery_replicated_vm.description: Manages a VM protected with Azure Site Recovery on Azure.

name.description: The name of the network mapping.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group where the vault that should be updated is located.

recovery_vault_name.description: The name of the vault that should be updated.

source_recovery_fabric_name.description: Name of fabric that should contains this replication.

source_vm_id.description: Id of the VM to replicate

source_recovery_protection_container_nam.description: Name of the protection container to use.

target_resource_group_id.description: Resource group disk should belong to when a failover is done.

target_recovery_fabric_id.description: Id of fabric where the VM replication should be handled when a failover is done.

target_recovery_protection_container_id.description: Id of protection container where the VM replication should be created when a failover is done.

target_availability_set_id.description: Id of availability set that the new VM should belong to when a failover is done.

disk_id.description: Id of disk that should be replicated.

staging_storage_account_id.description: Storage account that should be used for caching.

target_disk_type.description: What type should the disk be when a failover is done.

target_replica_disk_type.description: What type should the disk be that holds the replication data.

id.description: The ID of the Site Recovery Replicated VM.

create.description: Used when creating the Site Recovery Replicated VM.

update.description: Used when updating the Site Recovery Replicated VM.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Site Recovery Replicated VM.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Site Recovery Replicated VM.
